name: Don't Think Just Run
description:
Current version: 1.1

Cursor keys to move!

M to mute music, N to unmute music, R to restart the level.

Music is Ruminous Laments by Eliot Corley.

Explosion sound effect by NenadSimic.

If for some bizarre reason you want to make videos of this game, you have my permission to monetise it.
